article.title: Volumes and bulk densities of forty asteroids from ADAM shape modeling

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the general trend observed in the size vs. bulk density relationship for C-complex asteroids, excluding the three largest asteroids?
choices: Densities show a weak trend of increasing with size.
There is no clear trend in the size vs. bulk density relationship.

multiple_choice_question.text: Which taxonomic class generally displays the highest bulk density among the S, K, M, and V types?
What is the general range of bulk densities observed for most \'primitive\' asteroids, excluding those with poor/non-reliable estimates and the outliers?
What does the objective function χ² represent in the ADAM shape modeling algorithm?
choices: The goodness-of-fit measure for the model to various observational data.
The uncertainty in the asteroid\'s spin vector determination.
The bulk density of the asteroid.
